cause.description:
Hello everyone! i reckon for all who love dancing and messing around when ur out should support this cause lol! dance is tha way forward ppl! x
1. dancing is tha way forward
2. dancing is a universal right!
3. cutting shapes is also the way forward! :)
cause.mission: to get random ppl to start cutting shapes on the dancefloor when thier out!
cause.name: start cutting shapes on tha dancefloor! born in the 80's cause! :)
